agent.display_value: Document and visual insights AI agent (Copy)

sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.description:
Given a task definition ID and a list of attachments (together forming a document), submit a new task in DocIntel to extract the fields. Note that the attachments must all be from the same record.
The tool returns: - the sys_id of the task that was set up in DocIntel - a link to the UI to review the values - the time at which extraction started
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.inputs: [{"name":"task_definition_id","value":"","description":"sys_id of the DocIntel task definition to use","invalidMessage":null},{"name":"attachments_sys_ids","value":"","description":"list of sys_ids for the attachments to use as a document for extraction","invalidMessage":null}]
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.name: Submit task to DocIntel from attachments
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.sys_name: Submit task to DocIntel from attachments

tool.display_value: Submit task to DocIntel from attachments
